Happy New Year! #FarCry5 @FarCrygame @Ubisoft #FC5 #FC #FarCry #GamerGram #Ubisoft #FC5PhotoMode #Winter #VGPUnite https://t.co/zyH8yJukwg
I wish all of you the same. To find that happiness sooner or later Plus - it's my first real life post. No tags. No nothing. Only good vibes. (3/3)

I've never seen her this cheerful, and my own happiness keeps rising with every smile of hers. Now it's Christmas time, our first, proper Christmas since... forever. I couldn't be a happier man. I have my family, finally together, and in one place. (2/3)

Hello, my friends! Merry Christmas! I was away, and I am sorry for that, but my life was an emotional rollercoaster during the last few weeks. My mom had returned, she's with us now, and the Sheriff had decided to share a bit of his house so she could settle there. (1/3) https://t.co/Y0qB9uirI6
